snippet.title: Aura of Worlds  - Steam Trailer
snippet.description:
Aura of Worlds is a creative tactics roguelike platformer:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/841600/Aura_of_Worlds/
Explore multiple dangerous worlds where you must utilize creative abilities and wits to twist adversity to your advantage. 

Finding your way through ever-changing death labyrinths; you will be pitted against flooding passageways, intelligent enemies and gargantuan bosses that have made entire mazes their home...

We are thrilled to be launching on the 24th of April!
